Inclusion criterion Group III ( MenCCRM_12 M_MenACWYCRM_18 M ) Subjects eligible enrollment study healthy infant : 1. 12 month old ; 2. previously receive three dos DTaPHibIPV ( Pentacel ) vaccine ; 3. parent/legal guardian give write informed consent , nature study explain ; 4. available visit schedule study ; 5. good health determine medical history , physical examination , clinical judgment investigator .
